title: "Identify What Your Cat's Meow Means With This Cat Translator App"
excerpt: "Cat Translator app uses a technique called \"computational linguistics\" to analyze the sound patterns of a cat's meow and translate them into human language. It can detect the tone and emotion in your cat's voice and translate it into a human-readable text."
